page.title: 02LT.HORKESLEY CHURCH SERVICES
page.content: There are four services on a Sunday, these are Holy Communion at 8am, Childrens' Church at 10am, Mattins at 11am and Evening Song at 6:30pm. About 80_100 people attend Little Horkesley Church regularly.The last vicar left on June 2nd 1985.The Archdeacon announced in February that Wormingford and Mount Bures should be amalgamated with the parish of Little Horkesley.The people of Little Horkesley are not happy with this arrangement.The Bishop and the Church Wardens are trying to obtain the services of someone,probably retired, to take charge of the Parish of Lt. Horkesley by the offer of Fishponds (the vicarage) as a residence and a small pension to come from the Brocklebank trust.This situation has not yet been resolved.
